ygData.subject: Weapons for SKs
ygData.msgSnippet: Found an awesome site that lists ALL the weapons usable by class.  Below is a link to the SK page.  This site was on the main EQ site.  If they get good enough
ygData.messageBody:
Found an awesome site that lists ALL the weapons usable
by class. Below is a link to the SK page. This site
was on the main EQ site. If they get good enough
feedback they will add an Armor page.

http://www.noble1.com/eqwdb/byclass.asp?ID=ShadowKnight

Check it out and give your feedback.
I am now on the hunt for a Double-Bladed Bone Axe
(18/48) and a BIBS (20/47). Very nice. There is also
other weapons better (Razing Sword of Skarlon: 25/40 +
Serpent Sight; from a 50+ level MOB), but I can't enter
the Plane of Fear (Dark Sword of Blood: 30/45 + Soul
Leech), and I doubt a GM will give me the 1HS available
only from GMs(Elegant Darkwood Wakizashi: 22/17). :)

Can't wait to see what kind of Armor they list.

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
11th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
